original_text:
You have made us like sheep for slaughter
    and have scattered us among the nations.
korean_text: 주께서 우리를 잡아먹힐 양처럼 그들에게 넘겨 주시고 여러 민족 중에 우리를 흩으셨나이다

sentences.original_text: You have made us like sheep for slaughter
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 우리를 도살당할 양 같이 만드셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and have scattered us among the nations.
